Frank Gaffney, the President of the Center for Security Policy, will discuss the American serviceman killed by the Islamic State in Iraq as Americans wonder what our strategy is to defeat ISIS before more American blood is spilled.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, host and Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will interview the GOP frontrunner Donald J. Trump.

Penny Nance, President of Concerned Women for America and author of Feisty and Feminine: A Rallying Cry for Conservative Women, will discuss why Republican women hold the key to electoral success in 2016.
Special guests include veteran pollster Pat Caddell and J. Hogan Gidley, the former senior communications advisor to Governor Mike Huckabee, who will discuss the Indiana primary results.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Former Congressman Robert Walker of Pennsylvania, a supporter of Governor John Kasich, will discuss the Kasich campaign’s strategy going forward.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
